app_description.message: Removes all annoying ads and banners from YouTube!

full_description.message: Adblock Glow Youtube™ is a content filtering and ad blocking browser extension which blocks all ads on Youtube™.It allows users to prevent page elements, such as advertisements, from being displayed. Banner, Ad-Clips or even preroll ads you usually see before the actual video on Youtube are blocked by this extension. devoloper by thegayen
